name: Finger-based Pulse and Health Monitoring System
about: Utilizes IR light to non-invasively measure SpO2 and blood pressure. Uses TCRT1000 IR sensor with MCU and ESP32 for processing and wireless transmission.

name: Artificial Heart Prototype
about: Simulates the pumping action of a human heart for biomedical demonstrations using Arduino Nano, DC pump, IRF549N MOSFET, and Schottky diode.
